revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Muscle Band |image = [[File:Muscle Band.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Muscle Band'' |price = 1,000 {{battlepoints}} |location = [[Shops]] }} ==Description== The '''Muscle Band''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can be equipped to any Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 5%. ==Acquistion== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|Battle Frontie..."
